fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Ongaku is the Musical and Sound version of the Foxes. Once per night you may choose a 5 letter word, any word.
Attributes:
- If this is rolled and no Fox Heads are rolled, roll a Fox Head.
- The first player to say that word during the following day will die at day end.
- You cannot perform the factional kill and set a cursed word at the same time.
